public final class Scoring
extends java.lang.Object

Controls the scoring for the game.

Constructor Detail

Constructs the scoring system.

Parameters:

Method Detail

reset

public void reset(int spaceBelowPlayer)
Resets the score to the initial state. Does not reset the high score.

Parameters:
spaceBelowPlayer - Amount of space below the player to the bottom of the screen.

updateScore

public void updateScore(int currentAltitude)
Checks the score against the current altitude.

Parameters:
currentAltitude - The current altitude.

updateHighScore

public void updateHighScore()
Updates the high score if the current score is greater.

paint

public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g,
                  int currentAltitude,
                  int spaceBelowPlayer)
Draws the score on an image.

Parameters:
g - The graphics object for the image.
currentAltitude - The current altitude of the player.
spaceBelowPlayer - Amount of space below the player to the bottom of the screen.
